content: a beautiful and functional lace bookmark made using 2 00 mm needles and 2 skeins of embroidery thread or lace/light fingering yarn i designed this pattern using the instructions for curvy eyelet lace by brome fields 1 with a small garter stitch border and a pointed end perfect for hanging a beaded tassel the whole thing knits up in about 2 hours making an excellent last-minute gift for help with the tassel i would recommend any youtube tutorial edit 22/01/2025 i ve updated the pdf with some spelling corrections and clarifications to step 2 i ve also added a legend for the chart by user amwijsman s suggestion i didn t expect many people to find this but thank you for all the love 1 https //www bromefields com/curvy-eyelet-lace-knit-stitch/
